mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.USER_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.BOARD_CODE, B.ENROLL_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE, B.VIEWS, B.STATUS, B.DETAIL_STATUS, B.LIKES, U.NICK_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN "USER" U ON (B.USER_NO=U.USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE IN ('C','S','A','M') ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, BOARD_CODE, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, VIEWS, STATUS, DETAIL_STATUS, LIKES FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CODE = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRICE, QTY, CONTENT, TITLE, STATUS, LIKES, IMG FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC
SELECT BI.IMG_NO, BI.BOARD_NO, BI.ORIGIN_NAME, BI.CHANGE_NAME, B.BOARD_CODE FROM BOARD_IMG BI JOIN BOARD B ON B.BOARD_NO = BI.BOARD_NO ORDER BY BI.IMG_NO DESC
